EmailTemplate.subject: Your Opinion is Important to Us - Please Complete Short Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customers,
Thank you for joining Honeywell’s F900EX product demonstration. We appreciate the opportunity to show you some of the newest products and services Honeywell has to offer. We kindly request you complete the short survey below to help us better understand your experience:
CLICK HERE TO COMPLETE SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/59PM2KG]]>
